explains: v. 堵塞，阻塞（洞口、通道、道路等）；遮住，挡住（视线）；阻碍，妨碍

sentences.en: They were accused of attempting to obstruct justice.
sentences.cn: 他们被控企图妨碍司法公正。

sentences.en: He has tried to obstruct intellectual freedom.
What varies is not the basic form but the incidental details that do not obstruct the object's primary function.
sentences.cn: 变化的不是基本形式，而是不妨碍物体的主要功能的附属细节。
